content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
My classmates are so distinguished. I feel ashamed when I am among them.
Is there a specific reason why you feel ashamed? Perhaps you are feeling a little ashamed because of the way you are selected for a class?
Yes I am selected to somewhere I am not up for.
Well, you are not up for it, but it is the best time to drop out and get fresh air. Have you spoken to your classmates about this?
